EmailTemplate.name: SGN_BRD_16_TGL_EVNT_Single Cask Kinrossie Launch.Email - Reminder.Email - Remind
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Single Cask Kinrossie Launch Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The wait is almost coming to an end.
We will gather at 7pm, please be punctual to join us on the trail of the long-awaited unveiling.
Anticipation will be at its highest.
FACEBOOK <[[https://www.facebook.com/TheGlenlivet]]> INSTAGRAM <[[http://www.instagram.com/theglenlivet_sg]]> If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
